title: Aftermath
description: Lenny and Rebecca have survived the initial attack. An attack from who or what, they don’t know. Lenny’s fallout shelter should protect them, but there’s no telling how long it will last.Trapped underground for months on end, the isolation starts to take its toll. Will the cramped quarters make them turn on each other? When their systems start to falter they may be left with no choice but to go topside.Who did this? Is anyone still alive? Are they the last two survivors on Earth? The answers to these questions are only an elevator ride away.Aftermath the sequel to Prepped – The Doomsday Playbook Series
author: Rashad Freeman
